definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: The utilization of brewery sludge not only helps clean the environment, but also lowers the cost of alga cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 利用啤酒厂污泥既净化环境，又降低藻类养殖成本。

sentences.english: Our company is best breweries and Mr cooperation jointly established a set of production.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是和麦佳啤酒厂合作共同成立的一家集生产。

sentences.english: The brewery had 25 heavy horses delivering beer in London.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒厂有25匹高头大马在伦敦城中运送啤酒。

sentences.english: The workers are also picketing at two other breweries in protest of proposed workforce cuts. (Photo by Mark Renders/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 在另外两个啤酒厂也有工人抗议裁员。

sentences.english: It's suitable for the large and medium-sized brewhouse.
sentences.chinese: 系统清洗简便快捷，适用于大中型啤酒厂。

sentences.english: Astra House, was a brewery in Hamburg, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯特拉楼曾是德国汉堡的一家啤酒厂。

sentences.english: The system has already been adopted to an open air fermentation tank in Shijiazhuang Beer Factory and proved…
sentences.chinese: 该系统已用于石家庄啤酒厂露天发酵罐，并获得成功。

definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
